inclusionPriority.title: Inclusion priority
inclusionPriority.description: Inclusion priority in relation to other autocomplete-plus providers

excludeLowerPriority.title: Exclude lower priority providers
excludeLowerPriority.description: Whether to exclude lower priority providers

loadClassMembers.title: Load class members
loadClassMembers.description: If enabled, you can examine methods and other members of a class e.g. 'ArrayList.con...'.  NOTE: On a large project it might take a while to scan all classes on your classpath.

classpathFilePath.title: Classpath file path
classpathFilePath.description: If you bump into conflicts with other tools, e.g. Eclipse that uses .classpath in XML format, use this to rename the .classpath file to .classpath-atom or something else.
